leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 化学-反应预测与逆合成生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 清洗→预测→规划→路线评估→benchmark
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 预测/规划器 + 数据/评测

unit.unit_name: 反应数据清洗/标准化/模板提取

tools.name: rdkit-react
tools.one_line_profile: Script to perform chemical reactions on molecules using RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A Python script that utilizes RDKit to apply chemical reaction transformations (SMARTS) to a set of reactant molecules, generating product structures.

tools.name: reagent_emb_vis
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for exploring reagent roles in chemical reactions
tools.detailed_description: A tool for reaction data exploration that creates a map of reagents, identifying regions of similar reagent purposes to aid in understanding reaction roles.

tools.name: Jupyter Dock
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive Jupyter Notebooks for molecular docking protocols
tools.detailed_description: A set of interactive Jupyter Notebooks designed for performing molecular docking, including visualization, file format conversion, and result analysis.

tools.name: ElectrochemicalKinetics.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Electrochemical reaction rate modeling library
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library for modeling electrochemical reaction rates and generating nonequilibrium phase maps using automatic differentiation.

tools.name: RxnIM
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal Large Language Model for chemical reaction image parsing
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of 'Towards Large-scale Chemical Reaction Image Parsing via a Multimodal Large Language Model', converting reaction images to structured text.

tools.name: MaterialParser
tools.one_line_profile: Parser for chemical terms into structured chemical formulas
tools.detailed_description: A utility to compile strings of chemical terms into data structures representing chemical formulas and compositions, useful for text mining in materials science.

tools.name: id-mapper
tools.one_line_profile: ID mapping tool for biological entities
tools.detailed_description: A tool to map identifiers for biological entities such as metabolites, reactions, and genes across different databases.

tools.name: rdkit-scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of RDKit scripts for cheminformatics tasks
tools.detailed_description: A repository of Python scripts utilizing RDKit for various cheminformatics tasks, simplifying common molecular manipulation and analysis workflows.

tools.name: rdeditor
tools.one_line_profile: Simple RDKit-based molecule editor GUI
tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface for editing molecules, built using RDKit and PySide, allowing users to draw and modify chemical structures.

tools.name: scikit-mol
tools.one_line_profile: Scikit-learn compatible molecular vectorization using RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A library providing scikit-learn compatible classes for converting RDKit molecules into machine learning-ready vectors (fingerprints, descriptors).

tools.name: CBRdb
tools.one_line_profile: Curated biochemical reaction database
tools.detailed_description: A curated database integrating and refining biochemical reaction data from KEGG and ATLAS to support precise analyses.

tools.name: Molecules_Dataset_Collection
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of molecular datasets for property inference
tools.detailed_description: A collection of datasets containing molecules, intended for validating property inference models and machine learning tasks in chemistry.

tools.name: Click
tools.one_line_profile: Preprepared click chemistry reactions for RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A collection of pre-defined reaction SMARTS for 'click chemistry' reactions, ready to be used with RDKit for reaction enumeration.

tools.name: HeadTailAssign
tools.one_line_profile: Head and tail atom assignment for polymerization
tools.detailed_description: A tool that assigns head and tail atom positions in monomeric units or polymerization reactions represented in SMILES format.

tools.name: XLMExtractor-chem-reaction
tools.one_line_profile: Extractor for chemical reactions from patent XML files
tools.detailed_description: A script to extract chemical reaction information from US patent XML files, specifically designed for the dataset curated by Daniel M Lowe.

tools.name: pipelines
tools.one_line_profile: Containerised cheminformatics components
tools.detailed_description: A collection of containerised components and pipelines for cheminformatics and computational chemistry tasks, facilitating reproducible workflows.

tools.name: Reaction_Data_Cleaning
tools.one_line_profile: Chemical reaction data cleaning utilities
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for cleaning and standardizing chemical reaction data, likely including tasks like atom mapping verification and reagent normalization.

tools.name: psikit
tools.one_line_profile: Interface between Psi4 and RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that acts as a bridge between RDKit (cheminformatics) and Psi4 (quantum chemistry), facilitating quantum mechanical calculations on RDKit molecules.

tools.name: Levenshtein
tools.one_line_profile: Levenshtein SMILES augmentation for reaction datasets
tools.detailed_description: A tool for augmenting reaction datasets using Levenshtein distance-based SMILES randomization, improving model robustness.

tools.name: reaction_utils
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for chemical reaction datasets and templates
tools.detailed_description: A collection of utilities for processing chemical reaction datasets, including reaction template extraction and handling.

tools.name: ctfile
tools.one_line_profile: Parser for chemical table files (CTfile)
tools.detailed_description: A Python parser for the CTfile family of chemical file formats (Molfile, SDfile, etc.), enabling reading and writing of chemical structure data.

tools.name: nfp
tools.one_line_profile: Keras layers for molecular deep learning
tools.detailed_description: A library providing Keras layers for building end-to-end deep learning models for molecules and materials, integrating with RDKit and Pymatgen.

tools.name: RanDepict
tools.one_line_profile: Random chemical structure depiction generator
tools.detailed_description: A utility to generate diverse chemical structure depictions with random styles and augmentations, useful for training optical chemical structure recognition (OCSR) models.

tools.name: ccdutils
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for PDB chemical component definitions
tools.detailed_description: A set of Python tools using RDKit to handle and process chemical component definitions from the wwPDB Chemical Component Dictionary.

tools.name: Free-Wilson
tools.one_line_profile: Free-Wilson SAR analysis implementation
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the Free-Wilson method for Structure-Activity Relationship (SAR) analysis using RDKit.

tools.name: rd_filters
tools.one_line_profile: Structural alert filtering using RDKit and ChEMBL
tools.detailed_description: A script to filter molecules based on structural alerts (e.g., PAINS, Glaxo) using RDKit and data from ChEMBL.

tools.name: solubility
tools.one_line_profile: ESOL solubility prediction implementation
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Delaney's ESOL method for estimating aqueous solubility of molecules using RDKit.

tools.name: useful_rdkit_utils
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of useful RDKit functions
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing various helper functions and utilities for working with RDKit, addressing common cheminformatics tasks.

tools.name: RadonPy
tools.one_line_profile: Polymer physical property calculation library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library to automate physical property calculations for polymer informatics, including molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: cheminformatics-microservice
tools.one_line_profile: Microservices for cheminformatics API calls
tools.detailed_description: A set of microservices designed to provide cheminformatics functionality via API calls, supporting integration into larger systems.

tools.name: SynTemp
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-based reaction template extraction
tools.detailed_description: A tool for extracting reaction templates from chemical reaction data using a graph-based approach.

tools.name: ScaffoldGraph
tools.one_line_profile: Library for scaffold network generation and analysis
tools.detailed_description: An open-source cheminformatics library built using RDKit and NetworkX for generating and analyzing scaffold networks and trees.

tools.name: moldrug
tools.one_line_profile: Drug-oriented optimization package on chemical space
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed for drug-oriented optimization in chemical space, utilizing genetic algorithms for molecular generation and optimization.

tools.name: rdkit_ipynb_tools
tools.one_line_profile: RDKit utilities for Jupyter Notebooks
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools and helper functions to enhance the usage of RDKit within IPython/Jupyter Notebooks, facilitating chemical data visualization and analysis.

tools.name: Reaction Decoder Tool (RDT)
tools.one_line_profile: Atom-Atom Mapping Tool for chemical reactions
tools.detailed_description: A robust tool for extracting reaction templates and performing atom-atom mapping on chemical reactions, essential for reaction prediction and metabolic pathway analysis.

tools.name: MolPipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Scikit-learn wrapper for RDKit molecular processing
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that integrates RDKit molecular processing into scikit-learn pipelines, enabling streamlined machine learning workflows for cheminformatics.

tools.name: mols2grid
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive 2D molecule viewer for dataframes
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool that provides an interactive grid interface for viewing 2D molecular structures directly from pandas DataFrames, useful for chemical data exploration.

tools.name: Chembience
tools.one_line_profile: Docker-based platform for chemoinformatics services
tools.detailed_description: A containerized platform designed to facilitate the development and deployment of chemoinformatics web applications and microservices.

tools.name: chembl_beaker
tools.one_line_profile: RDKit wrapper and REST API
tools.detailed_description: A wrapper around RDKit that exposes its functionality, often used to provide chemical utility services in the ChEMBL ecosystem.

tools.name: ProLIF
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-Ligand Interaction Fingerprints generator
tools.detailed_description: A library to generate interaction fingerprints for protein-ligand complexes from molecular dynamics trajectories or docking poses, aiding in binding analysis.

tools.name: rxn-ebm
tools.one_line_profile: Energy-based modeling of chemical reactions
tools.detailed_description: A framework for modeling chemical reactions using energy-based models, capable of scoring reaction feasibility and predicting outcomes.

tools.name: rdchiral
tools.one_line_profile: Stereochemistry-aware reaction template handling
tools.detailed_description: A wrapper for RDKit's reaction handling code that improves the management of stereochemistry during template extraction and application, critical for retrosynthesis.

tools.name: retrotemp
tools.one_line_profile: Template-based retrosynthesis prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool for performing retrosynthetic analysis by predicting reaction templates, implementing methodologies similar to Segler and Waller.

tools.name: Datamol
tools.one_line_profile: High-level molecular processing library
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight Python library built on top of RDKit that simplifies molecular processing, manipulation, and visualization tasks for cheminformatics.

tools.name: rdkit-scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of RDKit cheminformatics scripts
tools.detailed_description: A repository of command-line scripts and utilities for common cheminformatics tasks using RDKit, such as docking preparation and conformation generation.

tools.name: chemistry_drawer
tools.one_line_profile: Plotly-based molecule drawer
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool that leverages Plotly to create interactive and high-quality drawings of chemical molecules.

tools.name: Indigo Toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Universal cheminformatics toolkit and libraries
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive cheminformatics toolkit providing libraries for molecule and reaction processing, canonicalization, and database search (Bingo), supporting multiple languages.

tools.name: Indigo ELN
tools.one_line_profile: Open Source Electronic Lab Notebook
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Electronic Lab Notebook (ELN) for chemistry, facilitating the recording, management, and searching of chemical experiments and reaction data.

tools.name: Indigo (GGA Software)
tools.one_line_profile: Cheminformatics toolkit (Legacy/Mirror)
tools.detailed_description: A cheminformatics toolkit and RDBMS data cartridge (Bingo) for Oracle/SQL Server/PostgreSQL. (Note: Likely the predecessor or mirror of the EPAM Indigo toolkit).

tools.name: Enzymemap
tools.one_line_profile: Atom mapping and correction for enzymatic reactions
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to perform atom mapping, correct reaction representations, and suggest enzymatic reactions, improving data quality for biocatalysis.

tools.name: espsim
tools.one_line_profile: Shape and ESP similarity scoring
tools.detailed_description: A tool for calculating molecular similarity based on shape and Electrostatic Potential (ESP) using RDKit, useful for virtual screening and bioisostere replacement.

tools.name: ReactionDatabase
tools.one_line_profile: Database of atom-mapped reaction SMILES
tools.detailed_description: A structured collection of reaction properties including atom-mapped reaction SMILES, serving as a dataset resource for reaction prediction models.

tools.name: templatecorr
tools.one_line_profile: Hierarchical template correction for reactions
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for the hierarchical correction of reaction templates, aiding in the standardization and cleaning of reaction data for machine learning.

tools.name: MolReactGen
tools.one_line_profile: Causal language model for molecule and reaction generation
tools.detailed_description: An auto-regressive causal language model based on GPT-2 for generating molecules (SMILES) and reaction templates (SMARTS), facilitating chemical space exploration.

tools.name: xyz2mol
tools.one_line_profile: Converts XYZ coordinates to RDKit molecular objects with connectivity
tools.detailed_description: A tool that converts Cartesian coordinates (XYZ) to molecular structures (RDKit Mol objects) by inferring connectivity and bond orders, useful for processing quantum chemistry output.

tools.name: ChemRxnExtractor
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for extracting chemical reactions from scientific literature
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based toolkit designed to automatically extract chemical reaction information (reactants, products, conditions) from scientific text, supporting data mining and database construction.

tools.name: AQME
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Quantum Mechanical Environments for workflows
tools.detailed_description: An automated workflow tool for generating conformers (RDKit/CREST), creating QM input files, and post-processing QM outputs, designed to streamline quantum chemistry tasks.

tools.name: Retrosynthesis-Prediction
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based model for retrosynthesis prediction
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Transformer sequence-to-sequence models for predicting retrosynthetic routes, including data augmentation strategies for reaction SMILES.

tools.name: Scopy
tools.one_line_profile: Library for negative design and HTS/VS database filtering
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for high-throughput screening (HTS) and virtual screening (VS) database design, focusing on negative design (filtering out undesirable compounds) and calculating molecular descriptors.

tools.name: scikit-chem
tools.one_line_profile: High-level cheminformatics package built on RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A cheminformatics library that provides a more Pythonic and high-level interface to RDKit, integrating well with the scientific Python stack (numpy, pandas) for molecular data analysis.

tools.name: PIDGINv3
tools.one_line_profile: Protein target prediction using random forests
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting protein targets for chemical compounds using Random Forest models and reliability-density neighbourhood analysis, aiding in drug discovery and target identification.

tools.name: eMolFrag
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular fragmentation tool based on BRICS algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the BRICS algorithm for decomposing molecules into fragments, useful for fragment-based drug design and retrosynthetic analysis.

tools.name: PoseBusters
tools.one_line_profile: Plausibility checks for generated molecule poses
tools.detailed_description: A test suite for validating generated molecular poses, checking for chemical and physical plausibility (e.g., bond lengths, clashes) to ensure quality in molecular docking or generative models.

tools.name: OChemR
tools.one_line_profile: Optical Chemical Reaction Recognition using Vision Transformers
tools.detailed_description: A tool that uses Vision Transformers (DETR) to detect and classify molecules, text, and arrows from chemical reaction images, converting them into machine-readable formats like SMILES.

tools.name: molecular_rectifier
tools.one_line_profile: Automated correction of unsanitizable RDKit molecules
tools.detailed_description: A utility to automatically fix and sanitize molecular structures that fail standard RDKit sanitization checks, handling common valence and connectivity errors.

tools.name: rdkit_to_params
tools.one_line_profile: Generates Rosetta params files from RDKit molecules
tools.detailed_description: A tool to create and modify Rosetta topology (params) files from RDKit molecule objects, facilitating the use of small molecules in Rosetta modeling workflows.

tools.name: MolVS
tools.one_line_profile: Molecule Validation and Standardization library
tools.detailed_description: A standard Python library for validating, standardizing, and salt-stripping chemical structures, ensuring data consistency for cheminformatics pipelines.

tools.name: ODDT
tools.one_line_profile: Open Drug Discovery Toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A modular and comprehensive toolkit for computer-aided drug discovery (CADD), providing unified interfaces for various cheminformatics backends (OpenBabel, RDKit) and implementing scoring functions and interaction fingerprints.

tools.name: ORD Schema
tools.one_line_profile: Schema and utilities for the Open Reaction Database
tools.detailed_description: Provides the data schema (Protocol Buffers) and Python/JavaScript libraries for defining, validating, and manipulating chemical reaction data in the Open Reaction Database format.

tools.name: RDKit
tools.one_line_profile: Open source cheminformatics and machine learning software
tools.detailed_description: The core RDKit library providing extensive functionality for cheminformatics, molecular modeling, descriptor calculation, and chemical data handling.

tools.name: RDKit.js
tools.one_line_profile: JavaScript port of the RDKit cheminformatics library
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript library that brings RDKit's cheminformatics capabilities to web browsers and Node.js, enabling client-side molecular rendering and processing.

tools.name: chemicalite
tools.one_line_profile: SQLite extension for storing and searching chemical structures
tools.detailed_description: A chemical database extension for SQLite that adds support for molecular structure storage, substructure search, and similarity search directly within the database engine.

tools.name: rxn-reaction-preprocessing
tools.one_line_profile: Preprocessing pipeline for chemical reaction datasets
tools.detailed_description: A library for preprocessing chemical reaction data, offering functionalities for standardization, filtering, augmentation, and tokenization, developed by IBM Research.

tools.name: rxn-standardization
tools.one_line_profile: Chemical compound standardization using language models
tools.detailed_description: A tool for standardizing chemical compounds and reaction representations, leveraging language models to ensure data consistency for downstream tasks.

tools.name: rxnaamapper
tools.one_line_profile: Reaction atom-mapping via language modeling
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating atom-to-atom mappings in chemical reactions using a language model approach, facilitating reaction understanding and mechanism analysis.

tools.name: rxnfp
tools.one_line_profile: Chemical reaction fingerprints and classification
tools.detailed_description: A library for generating data-driven reaction fingerprints using attention-based neural networks, enabling reaction classification and chemical space mapping.

tools.name: rxnmapper
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised attention-guided atom-mapping tool
tools.detailed_description: A state-of-the-art tool for extracting atom-to-atom mappings from chemical reactions using unsupervised learning and attention mechanisms from Transformer models.

tools.name: LocalMapper
tools.one_line_profile: Precise reaction atom-to-atom mapping tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating precise atom-to-atom mappings for chemical reactions, designed to handle complex reaction mechanisms.

tools.name: ORDerly
tools.one_line_profile: Cleaning and extraction of Open Reaction Database (ORD) data
tools.detailed_description: A library and benchmark suite for extracting, cleaning, and structuring chemical reaction data from the Open Reaction Database (ORD) for machine learning applications.

tools.name: pharmacophore-toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Simple pharmacophore model generation from RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for generating pharmacophore models from molecular structures using RDKit, aiding in drug design and virtual screening.

tools.name: molplotly
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive molecule visualization for Plotly
tools.detailed_description: An add-on for Plotly that enables interactive visualization of chemical structures (2D images) on mouseover events in scatter plots.

tools.name: RDMC
tools.one_line_profile: Reaction Data and Molecular Conformers package
tools.detailed_description: A package for handling chemical reactions, molecules, and conformers, with a focus on 3D structure manipulation and analysis.
